note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Rememberthemilk-jquerymobile
body:
### Remember The Milk App.
Remember the Milk is a nice todo-list manager. I liked the creating of smart-lists and used the service a lot. The iPhone and android apps are (were?) for paying users only. Lucky me! Time to build one. I started with this list viewer.

### jQuery mobile
I like jQuery a lot. It introduced me to javaScript. jQuery mobile must be good. I used a beta here.

### Demo or it didn't happen
You can see a demo of my code in action on [werktie](http://www.werktie.nl/rtm/rtm/)

### Code
There is not a lot of code in here. But the code that Ã¬s in here is organised, that's for sure! This code shows my passion for mobile development, the use of cross site content 'scraping' (ok, it's just RSS) and the ability to work in an organised fashion.

PS: I use and recommend doit.im for task management nowadays
tagline: Remember the milk in jQuery mobile (beta) handled by Zend Framework
